newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Bank/Portugal sets 160 bln esc variable rate repo.
newsitem.headline: Bank/Portugal sets 160 bln esc variable rate repo.

text.p: The Bank of Portugal offered to inject 160 billion escudos of seven-day funds into the money market in a variable rate securities repurchase tender effective on Monday.
Bids for the repo funds must be submitted by 1515 GMT.
